info-save: Store all your passwords, data or any information here, forget about paper notes and unprotected applications.
info-master-password: Create your master password: only you will be able to access your secrets with it.
what-saved-info: For example, your card number, the PIN and PUK of your mobile phone, the serial number of one of your devices or any information you need to keep in a safe place.
check-terms: I confirm that I am of legal age and agree to the processing of my data.
